From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron:



Unitron powered up his engine, running over Annhialator, laughing, the 
Predacon in his tank mode.  Transforming to robot mode, he landed on his skid 
plates.

Crawling over to a console, he pressed a series of commands, the computer 
voice blaring over the comm. system.

-Self destruct initiated, base will be obliterated in sixty seconds~

Looking up, he saw a hole in the cieling.  A hole that had never been 
repaired.  He remember Koga Shuko giving an order, but, no one had ever fixed 
the hole Megatron and Ominous Prime had made.  Unitron shrugged.  Using a 
console for leverage he climbed up on it, leaping in a mass of pain, clinging 
onto th edge of the hole.  

Pulling himself up with amazing strength, he got through the hole, which was 
barely big enough for him.

-Self destruct in 15 seconds- the computer informed him.

Getting into an upright position, he transformed into his jet fighter mode, 
launching into the sky.
